cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6.4)
project(FUNCTION_1 C)

include_directories(fsw/mission_inc)
include_directories(fsw/platform_inc)

aux_source_directory(fsw/src APP_SRC_FILES)


# Create the app module
add_cfe_app(function_1_app ${APP_SRC_FILES})

add_cfe_app_dependency(function_1_app dataview_lib)


# Executive services source files
target_include_directories(function_1_app PUBLIC ../../cfe/modules/es/fsw/src/)
target_link_libraries(function_1_app PRIVATE core_private)
